ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {

    width: 1em;

}

}
.TourList {

}
.TourDates:first-child {

.TourDates {

}

}

}

}
.TourList::after {

<div id="tourflexBox1" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/kailash-mansarovar-yatra" title="Kailash Mansarovar">Kailash Mansarovar</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c32773278a6_13271357" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/kailash-mansarovar-yatra-package-from-lucknow.jpg" alt="Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow" title="Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Kailash Mansarovar is one of the most significant places in all of Hinduism. It is a sacred site located in the Tibetan Himalayas. It is the abode of Lord Shiva, the Supreme God of Creation & Destruction in Hinduism. This place is considered the center of the world.</p>
<p>But while there is no question about the spiritual significance of this place and the breathtaking beauty that it offers to its travelers, reaching Kailash Mansarovar is quite challenging. However, we are here to provide you with an 8-night & 9-day tour of Kailash Mansarovar via Lucknow. Our tour will ensure meals and accommodation at every part of the journey, ensuring that you can enjoy your pilgrimage without any hassle. So, don’t wait - book your travels today!</p>
</p></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB3">
<div class="tour-overview">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>9D/ 8N Kailash Mansarovar Yatra</li>
<li>Enjoy a breathtaking helicopter journey to the sacred sites, saving time and energy</li>
<li>Spend an extra day at Darchen to acclimate to the weather condition</li>
<li>Travel with peace of mind as an oxygen cylinder for emergency use will accompany us</li>
<li>Portable toilet with toilet tent at guest houses</li>
<li>Comfortable stay and meals are included in the package</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Detailed Itinerary of the Trip</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Lucknow to Nepalgunj</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Our trip will begin from Lucknow, the beautiful capital city of the most populous state in India. We will pick you up from a pre-determined location in Lucknow. From here, you will be on your way. Our first stop? Nepalgunj.</p>
<p>From Lucknow, you will embark on a 4 to 5-hour ride (depending on the weather and road conditions) in an AC coach. As soon as we reach Nepalgunj, you will be immediately checked into your hotel rooms for an overnight stay. Rest for a fun journey tomorrow.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Nepalgunj - Simikot - Hilsa - Purang</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>The second day of our Kailash Mansarovar Yatra will see us wake up early in the morning. The reason? To catch a flight from Nepalgunj. This flight (40 to 50 minutes in duration) will whisk you away towards the mountainous town of Simikot. Here, we will take a short break, allowing our traveling party to stretch their legs, breathe in the fresh air, and spend a few hours allowing the body to acclimate to the new height.</p>
<p>Later, we will embark on a Helicopter ride (10 to 20 minutes in duration) that will take us swiftly to Hilsa. Then, we will move towards the Tibetan town of Purang, where we will settle into comfortable accommodations for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Stay at Purang</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>You will spend a vital day in Purang to acclimatize to the altitude of the place. The third day of the Yatra is free for you to do as you wish. You can even stretch your legs with a short preparatory trek of the upcoming Mount Kailash Parikrama.</p>
<p>You can alternatively explore Purang’s bustling shops - the choice is yours. We do recommend an early night as tomorrow is going to be a huge day on our tour.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Purang to Mansarovar Lake</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>On this day, we will board a comfortable AC Volvo Bus for the scenic journey from Purang to Mansarovar Lake. This will be a significant day of this trip and will see us wake up early in the morning.</p>
<p>As soon as we reach the Mansarovar Lake, we will begin our Parikrama. This drive will cover around 105 km and will take around 2 to 3 hours of the day. You can take a dip in the holy waters of the Mansarovar Lake and perform a puja. During the trip, you will also catch a glimpse of the divine Mount Kailash.</p>
<p>We will stay overnight at a Guest House near Lake Mansarovar. And if the weather permits, we will even return to the Mansarovar Lake in the night or early morning the next day.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Mansarovar Lake to Darchen</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>The halfway mark of our trip will see us wake up in the early morning for a possible visit to the Mansarovar Lake. After that, we will move towards our base in Darchen. This place will serve as our base for the sacred Mount Kailash Parikrama. We will also visit Ashtapad if we get the permission from the Chinese authorities.</p>
<p>Darchen serves as your resting point for the night, offering hotel accommodations as you prepare for the spiritual and physical challenges of the pilgrimage ahead.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>First Day Parikrama of Mount Kailash</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Today, we will begin our Parikrama of Mount Kailash.</p>
<p>Our traveling party will arise with the dawn and embark on a short drive to Yamdwar, which is the gateway to the sacred Parikrama around Mount Kailash. First, we will begin a 10 km trek, which will allow us to see the North Face of Mount Kailash.</p>
<p>Now, do keep in mind that the Parikrama of Mount Kailash is an optional offering of this trip. Those who choose not to trek can return to our base in Darchen for a two-night stay. From Darchen, you can gaze upon the majestic Mount Kailash throughout the day. We will reunite with them on day 8.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Second Day Parikrama of Mount Kailash</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>We will continue our Parikrama of Mount Kailash today. We will cover the most demanding part of the Kailash Parikrama, a 22 km trek from Dirapuk towards Dolma La Pass, on this day. At the end of this trek, we will ascend to a breathtaking height of 18,600 feet.</p>
<p>The first 6 to 7 km of this trek is quite steep, so brace yourself and rest when needed. Beyond Dolma La Pass, the path descends to Gauri Kund. We will also encounter Shivasthal on our journey. As the sun begins to set, we will take shelter in a lodge.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Back to Dongba</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Day 8 of our tour will see us complete the final 8 km of Mount Kailash Parikrama. Later, we will return to our base in Darchen, where we will meet up with the fellow travelers who stayed behind. Together, our traveling party will move back toward the beautiful town of Dongba for an overnight stay. This is officially the beginning of our return leg.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Arrival in Lucknow</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Day 9 is the final day of our Kailash Mansarovar Yatra tour.</p>
<p>We will get up with the rising sun in Dongba and then embark on a scenic drive back to Hilsa. From here, we will take to the skies once more as a helicopter will take you back to Simikot. We will take a flight back to the town of Nepalgunj from here.</p>
<p>Finally, we will move towards the city of Lucknow, carrying with us the memories that we have created on this journey. In Lucknow, our representatives will ensure a seamless transfer to your journey ahead!</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>

excerpt.rendered: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow Home » Kailash Mansarovar » Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Package from Lucknow Tour Overview Kailash Mansarovar is one of the most significant places in all of Hinduism. It is a sacred site located in the Tibetan Himalayas. It is the abode of Lord Shiva, the Supreme God of Creation &...
